jurisdictionInfo: Nation3 has its own legal system, enforced by its own court and secured by economic incentives.

agreement.termsHashDescription: The "terms hash" refers to the unique fingerprint of the associated agreement document file. It is generated by an algorithm based on the number of bits in the file. This hash is utilized to verify the integrity of the file, ensuring that it remains unaltered and is the same file that was used to create the agreement
agreement.collateralInfo: The tokens will be deposited into the agreement as collateral. In the event of a dispute, the court has the authority to allocate these tokens to any of the other parties as part of the dispute settlement
agreement.depositInfo: The tokens will be deposited into the agreement to cover arbitration costs in case of a dispute. If you don't raise a dispute, these tokens will be refunded upon agreement withdrawal
agreement.lackingTokens: It is required to have all necessary tokens in order to join the agreement

agreementActions.finalizeDescription: Notify all other parties involved that you intend to terminate the agreement without any dispute
agreementActions.disputeDescription: Initiate the transfer of the agreement to the court system for dispute resolution. The locked dispute fee will be utilized to cover the costs associated with this process.

newAgreement.heading: New agreement
newAgreement.subheading: Make your internet-native handshake a reality, all with the assurance of Nation3 Legal System.

agreementIntro.heading: What is an Agreement?
agreementIntro.subheading: A Nation3 Agreement is an internet-native contract, defined by agreed terms, secured by crypto assets, and backed by Nation3 Legal System, a built-in dispute resolution system for the internet era.

agreementTips.heading: Quick tips for great agreements
agreementTips.subheading: Crafting a detailed and precise agreement is key to successful dispute resolution in Nation3; aim for clarity in all terms and conditions for the best outcomes.

description.p1: Permit2 is a new industry standard to share and manage token approvals across different smart contracts.
description.p2: We use Permit2 to allow you to approve token transfers per agreement more safely & efficiently.
description.p3: You will only need to approve Permit2 for each token once.

agreementTitle.title: Agreement name
agreementTitle.description: The title that will be used to distinguish the agreement in the UI.

agreementTerms.title: Agreement Terms & file name
agreementTerms.description: These are the terms that the parties who enter the agreement will abide by. If one of the parties fails to comply with these terms, their financial stake can be taken away to compensate the other parties. The terms must be written in Linked Markdown.
agreementTerms.warning: You need to provide a valid terms file to continue.

agreementPositions.title: 2. Parties and stakes
agreementPositions.description: These are the participants that can enter the agreement, and how much collateral they must deposit to enter it.
agreementPositions.warning: You need to provide at least two valid participants to continue.

join.title: Join Agreement
join.summary: These are the tokens required for you to join the agreement. Once you complete the join, they will be locked into the agreement and you will be binded by its terms.

gaslessApprovals.title: Gasless approvals
gaslessApprovals.info: You can save gas on every agreement join by enabling gasless approvals once per token

signPermit.title: Approve gasless token transfers
signPermit.info: Approve all token transfers by signing only once

actions.description: Accept the agreement's terms and proceed with the transfer of the assets that are being used as collateral.

dispute.title: Dispute Agreement
dispute.description: Raising a dispute will put the agreement on hold until the dispute is settled by the court.

disputeCost.title: Dispute cost
disputeCost.description: Will be deducted from your dispute deposit.

evidenceSubmission.title: Submit claims & evidence
evidenceSubmission.description: To share your evidence with the Court before the dispute is dismissed.

disputeResolution.title: Resolved by Nation3 Court
disputeResolution.description: The Nation3 Court will resolve the dispute considering the evidence presented by all parties involved.

finalize.title: Finalize Agreement
finalize.description: Finalizing the agreement will signal that you are prepared to conclude the agreement without dispute.

tokenWithdrawal.title: Tokens to withdraw
tokenWithdrawal.description: You will be able to withdraw when all parties have finalized.

withdraw.title: Withdraw from Agreement
withdraw.description: By withdrawing from the agreement you will recover your deposited tokens and you will not be binded by its terms anynmore.

permitSignature.title: Approve tokens transfer
permitSignature.description: Approve the transfer of the appeal tokens by the arbitrator.

appealResolution.title: Appeal Resolution
appealResolution.description: Pay the appeal cost to block the enactment of the resolution and request its review.
